animals.name: Bella
animals.description: Friendly and energetic, loves playing fetch and swimming

animals.name: Max
animals.description: Playful and loyal, great with children and other pets

animals.name: Rocky
animals.description: Smart and protective, excellent guard dog and loyal companion

animals.name: Daisy
animals.description: Sweet and gentle, great nose and loves following scents

animals.name: Buddy
animals.description: Intelligent and hypoallergenic, great for families with allergies

animals.name: Whiskers
animals.description: Calm and affectionate, enjoys quiet spaces and sunbathing

animals.name: Luna
animals.description: Gentle giant, loves cuddles and has a majestic fluffy coat

animals.name: Mittens
animals.description: Playful and curious, loves chasing toys and exploring

animals.name: Shadow
animals.description: Mysterious and sleek, loves high places and quiet observation

animals.name: Thumper
animals.description: Sweet and hoppy, loves fresh vegetables and gentle pets

animals.name: Cotton
animals.description: Soft and calm, enjoys being brushed and eating hay

animals.name: Oreo
animals.description: Playful with floppy ears, loves exploring and treats

animals.name: Sunny
animals.description: Colorful and musical, loves to whistle and mimic sounds

animals.name: Sky
animals.description: Small and active, enjoys flying and learning tricks

animals.name: Rio
animals.description: Social and colorful, prefers having a feathered friend

animals.name: Mocha
animals.description: Small and social, loves fresh hay and gentle handling

animals.name: Cocoa
animals.description: Friendly and vocal, makes cute squeaking sounds when happy

animals.name: Slither
animals.description: Calm and easy to handle, perfect for first-time snake owners

animals.name: Squeaky
